Text:
Ahhh..Thank you for this one..I've been waiting/looking for this..

Okay..also..I must risk the wrath of the angry web because I'm looking for a Documentary ca. 2010 about a kid that dies or suicides in the U.S. and it was ALL the rage/talk and now I CANNOT find it..looked great..the crew visits the friends and family of this loner/skater kid and the piece looked quite beautiful and was proclaimed so..but the name escapes me..I've searched and searched..anyone? same year as "monsters" because I saw the preview along with that flick..anyway..thanks for this..
I think the documentary you're looking for is Boy:Interrupted.
Thanks a ton for this! Been looking all over for this one. A must-watch. :)
Thank you! My husband has been hanging out for this one!
